name: Awareness Test - The Robot Bar
description:
You are in a club full of robots, and you have to memorize all the things that you see, but you have only 10 seconds to do it!
Watch the video and try to remember as many things you can and try to answer to all the questions!

Let me tell you:  It's very hard to get ten in a row without cheating!

INSTRUCTIONS;

Click or touch the correct answer on the screen.
